titleInfo.title: (Thebes) Ramesseum. Salle hypostyle et colosse de Ramses II.

mods.abstract: The Ramesseum in western Thebes (New Kingdom Dynasty XIX); heavily inscribed open papyrus columns of hypostyle hall (foreground); ruins and broken colossus of Rameses II (background); "1032 (Thebes) Ramesseum, Salle hypostyle et colosse de Ramses II. Photogr. Art. G. Lekegian" in white along bottom of print. (Number on object is 9/655).

titleInfo.title: Nineteenth and Early Twentieth Century Images of Egypt

location.physicalLocation: Frank H. McClung Museum of Natural History and Culture

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Frank H. McClung Museum of Natural History and Culture
